info.title: iManage Work
info.description: iManage Work connector enables users to automate repetitive tasks and approval processes while they keep all their files secure in the iManage Work environment.

post.description: Returns a list of trustees with certain permissions for a document, folder or workspace. A trustee can be a user or group.

objectId.title: Object ID
objectId.description: Specifies the ID of the document, folder or workspace. An example of a document ID is 'ACTIVE_US!453.1'. An example of a folder or workspace ID is 'ACTIVE_US!123'.

full_name.title: Trustee Full Name
full_name.description: Indicates the full name of the trustee.

id.title: Trustee ID
id.description: Indicates the ID of the trustee. This can be a group ID or user ID. For example, 'JSMITH' or 'MARKETING'.

ssid.title: Trustee SSID
ssid.description: Indicates the numeric system ID of the trustee.

type.title: Trustee Type
type.description: Indicates the type of entity returned. Possible values are 'user' or 'group'.

post.description: Creates a new workspace based on the selected template. A workspace template is a predefined workspace whose structure is copied to the new workspace. Restrictions on the workspace template are automatically enforced when creating the new workspace.

libraryId.title: Library ID
libraryId.description: Specifies the library ID of the target workspace.

templateId.title: Template
templateId.description: Specifies the workspace template to use for creating the workspace and its children.

name.title: Name
name.description: Specifies the name of the workspace.

createChildren.title: Create Children
createChildren.description: Specifies to create all folders (optional and required) or only the required folders.

owner.title: Workspace Owner
owner.description: Specifies the owner of the workspace. You must be an iManage Work system administrator to set the owner of a workspace.

default_security.title: Default Security
default_security.description: Specifies the default access level. If it is not specified, the default access level of the selected template is used.

description.title: Description
description.description: Specifies additional information about the workspace.

custom1.title: Custom1
custom1.description: Specifies the value of custom1 to associate with the newly created workspace. This value overrides the custom1 value of the selected template workspace, if present. If the child folders have a custom1 value set, the custom1 value of those child folders is not overwritten.

custom2.title: Custom2
custom2.description: Specifies the value of custom2 to associate with the newly created workspace. To specify a value for custom2, you must also specify a value for custom1 in the same request, which is due to their parent-child relationship. This value overrides the custom2 value of the selected template workspace, if present. If the child folders have a custom2 value set, the custom2 value of those child folders is not overwritten.

custom21.title: Custom21
custom21.description: Specifies the value of custom21 in ISO 8601 datetime format.

custom22.title: Custom22
custom22.description: Specifies the value of custom22 in ISO 8601 datetime format.

custom23.title: Custom23
custom23.description: Specifies the value of custom23 in ISO 8601 datetime format.

custom24.title: Custom24
custom24.description: Specifies the value of custom24 in ISO 8601 datetime format.

custom30.title: Custom30
custom30.description: Specifies the value of custom30. To specify a value for custom30, you must also specify a value for custom29 in the same request, which is due to their parent-child relationship.

is_external_as_normal.title: Is External As Normal
is_external_as_normal.description: Specifies the workspace can be treated as a public workspace. If set to 'true' and 'default_security' is not 'private', sets 'is_external' to 'true'.

project_custom1.title: Project Custom1
project_custom1.description: Specifies additional information about the workspace. This field is different than the metadata custom field associated with content items, such as documents, workspaces or folders. This is descriptive text that does not have to be formatted, and is not validated.

project_custom2.title: Project Custom2
project_custom2.description: Specifies additional information about the workspace. This field is different than the metadata custom field associated with content items, such as documents, workspaces or folders. This is descriptive text that does not have to be formatted, and is not validated.

project_custom3.title: Project Custom3
project_custom3.description: Specifies additional information about the workspace. This field is different than the metadata custom field associated with content items, such as documents, workspaces or folders. This is descriptive text that does not have to be formatted, and is not validated.

subclass.title: Workspace Subclass
subclass.description: Specifies the subclass of the workspace based on the subclass of the document it contains.

post.description: Updates information of the specified workspace. To delete the existing value of a string field, set the value of the field to an empty string wrapped in single or double quotes.

id.title: Workspace ID
id.description: Specifies the ID of the workspace to be updated. For example, 'ACTIVE_US!427'.

name.title: Name
name.description: Specifies the name of the workspace.

owner.title: Workspace Owner
owner.description: Specifies the owner of the workspace.

custom2.title: Custom2
custom2.description: Specifies the value of custom2. To specify a value for custom2, you must also specify a value for custom1 in the same request, which is due to their parent-child relationship.

custom21.title: Custom21
custom21.description: Specifies the value of custom21, in ISO 8601 datetime format.

custom22.title: Custom22
custom22.description: Specifies the value of custom22, in ISO 8601 datetime format.

custom23.title: Custom23
custom23.description: Specifies the value of custom23, in ISO 8601 datetime format.

custom24.title: Custom24
custom24.description: Specifies the value of custom24, in ISO 8601 datetime format.

custom30.title: Custom30
custom30.description: Specifies the value of custom30. To specify a value for custom30, you must also specify a value for custom29 in the same request, which is due to their parent-child relationship.

default_security.title: Default Security
default_security.description: Specifies the default security access level.

description.title: Description
description.description: Specifies additional information about the workspace.

is_external_as_normal.title: Is External As Normal
is_external_as_normal.description: Specifies if the workspace can be treated as a public workspace. If set to 'true' and 'default_security' is not 'private', 'is_external' is set to 'true'.

project_custom1.title: Project Custom1
project_custom1.description: Specifies additional information about the workspace. This field is different than the metadata custom field associated with content items, such as documents, workspaces, or folders. This is descriptive text that does not have to be formatted, and is not validated.

project_custom2.title: Project Custom2
project_custom2.description: Specifies additional information about the workspace. This field is different than the metadata custom field associated with content items, such as documents, workspaces, or folders. This is descriptive text that does not have to be formatted, and is not validated.

project_custom3.title: Project Custom3
project_custom3.description: Specifies additional information about the workspace. This field is different than the metadata custom field associated with content items, such as documents, workspaces, or folders. This is descriptive text that does not have to be formatted, and is not validated.

subclass.title: Workspace Subclass
subclass.description: Specifies the subclass of the workspace based on the subclass of the document it contains.

get.description: Gets the list of document classes available in a library that match the specified criteria.

parameters.name: libraryId
parameters.description: Specifies the library ID of the target class.

parameters.name: alias
parameters.description: Specifies the ID of a class or classes to search for. Can be a comma-separated list. This search is not case-sensitive. The wildcard character (*) and partial matches are supported.

parameters.name: default_security
parameters.description: Specifies the default security access level.

parameters.name: description
parameters.description: Specifies the text to match in the description field. This search is not case-sensitive. The wildcard character (*) is supported. Partial matches are not supported.

parameters.name: echo
parameters.description: Specifies if documents of this class can echo documents.

parameters.name: hipaa
parameters.description: Specifies if documents of this class use HIPAA compliant encryption.

parameters.name: indexable
parameters.description: Specifies if documents of this class are indexed by the system's full-text indexer.

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: Specifies the text to match with the ID or description fields. This search is not case-sensitive. The wildcard character (*) and partial matches are supported.

parameters.name: subclass_required
parameters.description: Specifies if the class has a required subclass.

topMatchingId.title: Top Matching Class ID
topMatchingId.description: Indicates the ID of the top matching class. For example, 'PETITION'.

topMatchingDescription.title: Top Matching Class Description
topMatchingDescription.description: Indicates the description of the top matching class.

description.title: Class Description
description.description: Indicates additional information about the class.

hipaa.title: Is HIPAA
hipaa.description: Indicates if the document is encrypted.

id.title: Class ID
id.description: Indicates the ID of the class. For example, 'PETITION'.

indexable.title: Is Indexable
indexable.description: Indicates if the document is indexed by the system.

default_security.title: Default Security
default_security.description: Indicates the default security access level. Possible values are 'public','view','private'.

retain.title: Retain
retain.description: Indicates the number of days before marking inactive documents of this class as expired.

required_fields.title: Required Fields
required_fields.description: Indicates the mandatory custom properties to be entered when creating or updating a document of this class.

shadow.title: Is Shadowed
shadow.description: Indicates if a document of this class is shadowed (retained) on a user's local computer after checking it in.

subclass_required.title: Is Subclass Required
subclass_required.description: Indicates if a subclass is required for this class.

get.description: Gets all the library subclasses that match the specified criteria.

parameters.name: libraryId
parameters.description: Specifies the library ID of the target subclass.

parameters.name: classId
parameters.description: Specifies the ID of the Class that is the parent of this subclass. For example, 'PETITION'.

parameters.name: alias
parameters.description: Specifies the ID of subclasses to search for. Can be a comma-separated list. The wildcard character (*) is supported. Partial matches are supported when the wildcard character is used.

parameters.name: default_security
parameters.description: Specifies the default security access level.

parameters.name: description
parameters.description: Specifies the text to match in the description field. The wildcard character (*) is supported. Partial matches are supported when the wildcard character is used.

parameters.name: echo
parameters.description: Specifies if the subclasses can be echoed to a user's local hard drive. This is to facilitate working offline.

parameters.name: hipaa
parameters.description: Specifies if HIPAA compliant subclasses are to be returned.

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: Specifies the text to match with the Subclass ID or description fields. The wildcard character (*) is supported. Partial matches are supported.

topMatchingId.title: Top Matching Subclass ID
topMatchingId.description: Indicates ID of the top matching subclass.

topMatchingDescription.title: Top Matching Subclass Description
topMatchingDescription.description: Indicates description of the top matching subclass.

default_security.title: Default Security
default_security.description: Indicates default security access level. Possible values are 'public','view','private'.

description.title: Subclass Description
description.description: Indicates additional information about the subclass. Maximum length is 255 characters.

hipaa.title: Is HIPAA
hipaa.description: Indicates if the document is encrypted.

id.title: Subclass ID
id.description: Indicates the ID of a subclass used to create or modify the document profile information. For example, 'GUARDIANSHIP'.

id.title: Parent ID
id.description: Indicates the parent class ID of the subclass

required_fields.title: Required Fields
required_fields.description: Indicates the mandatory custom properties to be entered when creating or updating a document of this subclass.

retain.title: Retain
retain.description: Indicates the number of days before marking inactive documents of this subclass as expired.

shadow.title: Is Shadowed
shadow.description: Indicates if a document of this subclass is shadowed (retained) on a user's local computer after checking it in.

parameters.description: Specifies the lower limit of custom21 (in ISO 8601 datetime format) to search. This property is not reserved by iManage Work and is not a validated value. It is intended to be customized for your company's requirements.

parameters.name: custom21_to
parameters.description: Specifies the upper limit of custom21 (in ISO 8601 datetime format) to search. This property is not reserved by iManage Work and is not a validated value. It is intended to be customized for your company's requirements.

parameters.name: custom21_relative
parameters.description: Specifies a date range to search, relative to the current date. This parameter has a format of [begin]:[end][time units (d, m or y)]. For example, -15:1d specifies a date range from 15 days prior to the current date through one day after the current date (one day in the future).

post.description: Creates, updates or deletes name-value pair properties of a document, folder or workspace. To delete a name-value pair, set the value of the key to an empty string wrapped in single or double quotes ('')

objectType.title: Object Type
objectType.description: Specifies the type of object. Possible values are 'document','folder','workspace'.

objectId.title: Object ID
objectId.description: Specifies the ID of the document, folder or workspace. An example of a document ID is 'ACTIVE_US!453.1'. An example of a folder or workspace ID is 'ACTIVE_US!123'.

nameValuePairs.title: Name-value Pairs
nameValuePairs.description: Specifies the free-form name and value pairs for this document.

libraryId.title: Library ID
libraryId.description: Specifies the library ID of the target folder.

container_id.title: Container ID
container_id.description: Specifies the ID of the workspace or folder from which to return folders. For example, 'ACTIVE_US!987'. If this parameter is provided, it returns folders only from the specified workspace or folder.

description.title: Folder Description
description.description: Specifies a value to be found in the description property of the folder. This search is not case-sensitive. Partial matches are supported.

email.title: Folder Email Address
email.description: Specifies the email address to match with the folder email address. For example, 'email1234@ajubalaw.com'.

name.title: Folder Name
name.description: Specifies a value to be found in the name property of the folder. This search is not case-sensitive. Partial matches are supported.

owner.title: Folder Owner
owner.description: Specifies the string to match with the owner associated with the folder. This search is not case-sensitive. Partial matches are supported.

workspace_name.title: Workspace Name
workspace_name.description: Specifies the of the parent workspace to which the folder belongs. This search is not case-sensitive. Partial matches are supported.

post.description: Uploads a file as a new document to the specified folder.

post.summary: Update current or create new document version
post.description: Updates the specified version of a document, or creates a new version. This action can update the profile and content of a document. If 'Update Current Version' option is specified, the document is replaced with a new one and the profile of the previous document is maintained. If 'Create New Version' is specified, a new version of the document is created that inherits the profile of the folder. Upon successful execution of the operation, the document profile is returned.

parameters.name: updateOrCreate
parameters.description: Specifies to update the current version of the document or to create a new version.

post.description: Downloads a version of a specific document, based on the document ID. If latest is true, the latest version of this document is downloaded. The download is a stream and is not saved locally.

documentId.title: Document ID
documentId.description: Specifies the ID of the document. For example, 'ACTIVE_USE!453.1'.

latest.title: Get Latest Version
latest.description: Specifies to download the latest version of the document.

x-im-file-name.description: Indicates the name of the file.

schema.title: File Content
schema.description: Indicates the contents of the file.

post.description: Gets information about a user from the specified library.

libraryId.title: Library ID
libraryId.description: Specifies the library ID of the target user.

userId.title: User ID
userId.description: Specifies the ID of the user for which to get detailed profile information. For example, 'JSMITH'.

200.description: User profile stored in the library.

post.description: Gets the workspace profile, and optionally the list of allowed operations for the workspace.

workspaceId.title: Workspace ID
workspaceId.description: Specifies the ID of the workspace. For example, 'ACTIVE_US!427'.

get.description: Gets a list of libraries to which the user has access.

id.title: Library ID
id.description: Indicates the name of the library.

display_name.title: Library Name
display_name.description: Indicates the display name of the library.

type.title: Library Type
type.description: Indicates the type of the library. Possible values are 'worksite' or 'linksite'.

is_hidden.title: Is Hidden Library
is_hidden.description: Indicates if the library is hidden.

post.description: Gets the document properties associated with a specific document ID.

documentId.title: Document ID
documentId.description: Specifies the ID of the document. For example, 'ACTIVE_US!453.1'.

latest.title: Get Latest Version
latest.description: Specifies to get the latest version of the document.

post.description: Performs updates on the document profile. A document must not be in use while updating its profile and the profile of a document that is checked out cannot be updated. Returns an updated document profile after the operation.

alias.title: Alias
alias.description: Specifies the alias of this document.

author.title: Author
author.description: Specifies the ID of the user that created the document. For example, 'JSMITH'.

comment.title: Comment
comment.description: Specifies additional information about the document.

default_security.title: Document Default Security
default_security.description: Specifies the default security access level.

documentId.title: Document ID
documentId.description: Specifies the ID of the document. For example, 'ACTIVE_US!453.1'.

is_declared.title: Is Declared
is_declared.description: Specifies if the document has been declared as a record. A document that has been declared as a record can no longer be edited or deleted, except by an iManage Work system administrator.

name.title: Document Name
name.description: Specifies the file name of the document.

operator.title: Operator
operator.description: Specifies the ID of the user has the document checked out or is currently editing the document's profile. For example, 'JSMITH'.

retain_days.title: Retain Days
retain_days.description: Specifies the number of days before the inactive document is eligible for archiving.

custom2.title: Custom2
custom2.description: Specifies the value of custom2. To specify a value for custom2, you must also specify a value for custom1 in the same request, which is due to their parent-child relationship.

custom21.title: Custom21
custom21.description: Specifies the value of the custom21 property in ISO 8601 datetime format.

custom23.description: Specifies the value of the custom23 property in ISO 8601 datetime format.

parameters.description: Specifies the ID of the group. For example, 'MARKETING'.

parameters.description: Specifies a filter for users based on the current 'allow_logon' property value for each user.

parameters.description: Specifies the maximum number of members to return regardless of the total number of members in the group.

parameters.name: preferred_library
parameters.description: Specifies that only users whose preferred library matches the provided value be returned.

is_external.title: Is External
is_external.description: Indicates if the user is an external user.

allow_logon.title: Allow Logon
allow_logon.description: Indicates if the user is allowed to logon.

access.title: Document Access
access.description: Indicates the access level permission set for a document or container. The access level is set by the author or a user with full access to the item. Possible values are 'no_access','read','read_write','full_access'.

alias.title: Alias
alias.description: Indicates the alias of this document.

arch_req.title: Archive Request
arch_req.description: Indicates that the document is marked for archive.

author.description: Indicates the ID of the user that created the document. For example, 'JSMITH'.

author_description.description: Indicates additional information about the document's author.

bcc.description: Indicates recipients to whom the email is blind carbon copied. Only applicable to emails.

cc.title: Cc
cc.description: Indicates recipients to whom the email is carbon copied. Only applicable to emails.

class_description.title: Document Class Description
class_description.description: Indicates additional information about the document class.

comment.title: Comment
comment.description: Indicates additional information about the document.

create_date.title: Document Creation Date
create_date.description: Indicates the date and time (in ISO 8601 format) the document was imported into the iManage Work system. This date can be different than 'file_create_date'.

database.title: Database
database.description: Indicates the library where the document is stored.

declared_date.title: Declared Date
declared_date.description: Indicates the date and time (in ISO 8601 format) the document was declared as a record.

default_security.title: Document Default Security
default_security.description: Indicates the default security access level. Possible values are 'inherit','private','view','public'.

document_number.title: Document Number
document_number.description: Indicates the document number of a document.

document_url.title: Document URL
document_url.description: Indicates the sharable link for the document.

edit_date.title: Document Edit Date
edit_date.description: Indicates the date and time (in ISO 8601 format) of the most recent change to the document.

edit_profile_date.title: Profile Edit Date
edit_profile_date.description: Indicates the date and time (in ISO 8601 format) of the most recent change to the document profile.

extension.title: Document Extension
extension.description: Indicates the file name extension, also called the application extension, of the document.

file_create_date.title: File Creation Date
file_create_date.description: Indicates the date and time (in ISO 8601 format) the file was created. The file may have been created outside of the iManage Work system. This date can be different than 'create_date'.

file_edit_date.title: File Editing Date
file_edit_date.description: Indicates the date and time (in ISO 8601 format) of the most recent change to the file. The file may have been changed before being uploaded into the iManage Work system.

from.title: From
from.description: Indicates the sender of the email. Only applicable to emails.

full_file_name.title: Full File Name
full_file_name.description: Indicates the full file name of the document. Includes the file name extension.

has_attachment.title: Has Attachment
has_attachment.description: Indicates if email has attachments. Only applicable to emails.

basic_properties.title: Basic Document Properties
basic_properties.description: Indicates an embeddable '<span>' element that contains basic document properties.

id.title: Document ID
id.description: Indicates the ID of the document. For example, 'ACTIVE_US!453.1'.

indexable.title: Is Indexable
indexable.description: Indicates if the document is indexed by the system.

in_use_by.title: In-use By
in_use_by.description: Indicates the ID of the user currently working on the document or has it checked out. For example, 'JSMITH'.

in_use_by_description.title: In-use By Description
in_use_by_description.description: Indicates additional information about the user who is currently working on the document or who has it checked out.

is_archived.title: Is Archive
is_archived.description: Indicates if the document is archived.

is_checked_out.title: Is Checked Out
is_checked_out.description: Indicates if the document is checked out.

is_declared.title: Is Declared
is_declared.description: Indicates if the document has been declared as a record. A document that has been declared as a record can no longer be edited or deleted, except by an iManage Work system administrator.

is_external.title: Is External
is_external.description: Indicates if the document is shared with external users.

is_external_as_normal.title: Is External As Normal
is_external_as_normal.description: Indicates if the document is external as normal.

is_in_use.title: Is In-use
is_in_use.description: Indicates if the document is in use.

is_latest.title: Is Latest
is_latest.description: Indicates if this is the latest version of the document.

is_related.title: Is Related
is_related.description: Indicates if document is related to another document.

is_restorable.title: Is Restorable
is_restorable.description: Indicates if the document can be restored.

iwl.title: Document Link
iwl.description: Indicates the iManage Work Link (iWL) for the document. The iWL is used to open the document in Protected View Mode by the user who has 'read_write' or 'full_access'.

last_user.title: Last User
last_user.description: Indicates the ID of the user that edited the document most recently. For example, 'JSMITH'.

last_user_description.title: Last User Description
last_user_description.description: Indicates additional information about the last user that edited the document most recently.

latest.title: Latest Version
latest.description: Indicates the latest version number of the document.

name.title: Document Name
name.description: Indicates the file name of the document.

operator.title: Operator
operator.description: Indicates the ID of the user that has the document checked out or is currently editing its profile. For example, 'JSMITH'.

operator_description.title: Operator Description
operator_description.description: Indicates additional information about the operator.

received_date.title: Received Date
received_date.description: Indicates the date and time (in ISO 8601 format) the email was received. Only applicable to emails.

retain_days.title: Retain Days
retain_days.description: Indicates the number of days before the document is eligible for archiving. Only applicable to inactive documents.

sent_date.title: Sent Date
sent_date.description: Indicates the date and time (in ISO 8601 format) the email was sent. Only applicable to emails.

size.title: Document Size
size.description: Indicates the size of the document in bytes.

subclass.title: Subclass
subclass.description: Indicates the subclass of the document.

subclass_description.title: Subclass Description
subclass_description.description: Indicates additional information about the document's subclass.

to.title: To
to.description: Indicates the recipient of the email. Only applicable to emails.

type.title: Type
type.description: Indicates the document type. For example, WORD for Microsoft Word. For a current list of types, contact your iManage Work system administrator.

type_description.title: Type Description
type_description.description: Indicates additional information about the document's type.

version.title: Document Version
version.description: Indicates the version number of the document.

workspace_id.title: Workspace ID
workspace_id.description: Indicates the ID of the document's workspace. For example, 'ACTIVE_US!427'.

workspace_name.title: Workspace Name
workspace_name.description: Indicates the name of the document's workspace.

wstype.title: Wstype
wstype.description: Indicates the iManage Work type of the object. Possible values are 'document','folder','workspace','email','document_shortcut','folder_shortcut','workspace_shortcut','user'.

document_number.description: Indicates the document number for the document that is associated with the workspace. For example, if the document ID is 'ACTIVE_US!6453.2', the document number is '6453'.

edit_date.title: Edit Date
edit_date.description: Indicates the date and time (in ISO 8601 format) of the most recent change to the workspace.

effective_security.title: Effective Security
effective_security.description: Indicates the default security access level. Possible values are 'no_access','read','read_write','full_access'.

has_subfolders.title: Has Sub-folders
has_subfolders.description: Indicates if the workspace has other folders under it.

id.title: Workspace ID
id.description: Indicates the ID of the workspace. For example, 'ACTIVE_US!427'.

is_external.title: Is External
is_external.description: Indicates if the workspace is shared with external users.

is_external_as_normal.title: Is External As Normal
is_external_as_normal.description: Indicates if the workspace can be treated as a public workspace.

is_hipaa.title: Is HIPAA
is_hipaa.description: Indicates if the workspace is encrypted.

iwl.title: Workspace Link
iwl.description: Indicates the iManage Work Link (iWL) of a workspace.

last_user.title: Last User
last_user.description: Indicates the ID of the user that accessed this workspace most recently. For example, 'JSMITH'.

last_user_description.title: Last User Description
last_user_description.description: Indicates additional information about the user that accessed this workspace most recently.

name.title: Workspace Name
name.description: Indicates the name of the workspace.

owner.title: Workspace Owner
owner.description: Indicates the user ID of workspace owner.

owner_description.title: Workspace Owner Description
owner_description.description: Indicates additional information about the workspace owner.

project_custom1.title: Project Custom1
project_custom1.description: Indicates additional information about the workspace. This field is different than the metadata custom field associated with content items, such as documents, workspaces, or folders.

project_custom2.title: Project Custom2
project_custom2.description: Indicates additional information about the workspace. This field is different than the metadata custom field associated with content items, such as documents, workspaces, or folders.

project_custom3.title: Project Custom3
project_custom3.description: Indicates additional information about the workspace. This field is different than the metadata custom field associated with content items, such as documents, workspaces, or folders.

retain_days.title: Retain Days
retain_days.description: Specifies the number of days before the inactive document is eligible for archiving.

subclass.title: Workspace Subclass
subclass.description: Indicates the subclass of the workspace based on the subclass of the document it contains.

version.title: Document Version
version.description: Indicates the version number of the document.

wstype.title: Wstype
wstype.description: Indicates the iManage Work type of the object. Possible values are 'document','folder','workspace','email','document_shortcut','folder_shortcut','workspace_shortcut','user'.

workspace_url.title: Workspace URL
workspace_url.description: Indicates the sharable link for the workspace.

id.title: Template ID
id.description: Indicates the ID of the template. For example, 'ACTIVE_US!12'.

name.title: Template Name
name.description: Indicates the name of the template.

allow_logon.title: Allow Logon
allow_logon.description: Indicates if the user is allowed to sign in.

custom1.title: Custom1
custom1.description: Indicates additional information about the user.

custom2.title: Custom2
custom2.description: Indicates additional information about the user.

custom3.title: Custom3
custom3.description: Indicates additional information about the user.

directory_id.title: Directory ID
directory_id.description: Indicates the ID from an external directory (such as ADFS), which is used for user profile synchronization.

distinguished_name.title: Distinguished Name
distinguished_name.description: Indicates the name of the object that represents the fully qualified path of names that trace the entry back to the root of the LDAP tree.

edit_date.title: Edit Date
edit_date.description: Indicates the date and time (in ISO 8601 format) of the most recent change to the user profile.

email.title: Email
email.description: Indicates the email of the user.

exch_autodiscover.title: Exchange Auto-discover URL
exch_autodiscover.description: Indicates the exchange server details of the user.

extension.title: Extension
extension.description: Indicates the phone number extension of the user.

failed_logins.title: Failed Login Attempts
failed_logins.description: Indicates the current number of failed sign-in attempts of the user.

fax.title: Fax
fax.description: Indicates the fax number of the user.

force_password_change.title: Force Password Change
force_password_change.description: Indicates the user must change their password on next sign-in. Only applicable to virtual users, indicated by 'user_nos' value '2'.

full_name.title: Full Name
full_name.description: Indicates the full name of the user.

general.title: General
general.description: Indicates general information about the user.

id.title: User ID
id.description: Indicates the ID of the user. For example, 'JSMITH'.

is_external.title: Is External User
is_external.description: Indicates an external user. An external user has limited access and is commonly used for temporary team members, consultants, or those external to the organization.

last_sync_ts.title: Last Sync Time
last_sync_ts.description: Indicates the last sync time (in ISO 8601 datetime format) of the user's profile with an external directory, such as LDAP or Microsoft Active Directory (ADFS).

location.title: Location
location.description: Indicates the geographical location of the user.

password_never_expire.title: Password Never Expires
password_never_expire.description: Indicates if the user's password never expires.

phone.title: Phone Number
phone.description: Indicates the phone number of the user.

preferred_library.title: Preferred Library
preferred_library.description: Indicates the preferred library. A preferred library is the user's default library. Each user must have one preferred library.

pwd_changed_ts.title: Password Changed Time
pwd_changed_ts.description: Indicates the time (in ISO 8601 datetime format) when the user's password was last changed. This is applicable to virtual users only (whose User NOS is 2).

user_domain.title: User Domain
user_domain.description: Indicates the fully qualified domain name for the user's directory service.

user_id_ex.title: Extended User ID
user_id_ex.description: Indicates the original value of the user ID that is received from an external directory such as Microsoft Active Directory (ADFS).

user_nos.title: User NOS
user_nos.description: Indicates the type of operating system from which the user is synced. Possible values are ‘2’ (Virtual user) and ‘6’ (Enterprise user). For more information, contact your iManage Work system administrator.

user_num.title: User Number
user_num.description: Indicates the numeric system ID of the user.

basic_properties.title: Basic Workspace Properties
basic_properties.description: Indicates an embeddable <span> element that contains basic workspace properties.

create_date.title: Creation Date
create_date.description: Indicates the date and time (in ISO 8601 format) the workspace was created.

database.title: Database
database.description: Indicates the library where the document is stored.

default_security.title: Default Security
default_security.description: Indicates the default security access level for the workspace. Possible values are 'inherit','private','view','public'.

libraryId.name: libraryId
libraryId.description: Specifies the library ID of the target library.

folderId.name: folderId
folderId.description: Specifies the folder ID of the target folder. For example, 'ACTIVE_US!987'.

fileCreateDate.name: file_create_date
fileCreateDate.description: Specifies the date and time (in ISO 8601 format) the file was created. The file could have been created outside of the iManage Work system. This date can be different than 'create_date'. The create_date is the date when the file was created or imported by the iManage Work system.

fileEditDate.name: file_edit_date
fileEditDate.description: Specifies the date and time (in ISO 8601 format) of the most recent change to the file. The file could have been changed before being uploaded into the iManage Work system.

documentId.name: documentId
documentId.description: Specifies the ID of the existing document. For example, 'ACTIVE_US!556.1'.

inheritFolderProfile.name: inherit_profile_from_folder
inheritFolderProfile.description: Specifies if the profile data is inherited from the parent folder.

keepLocked.name: keep_locked
keepLocked.description: Specifies if a document lock is kept after upload.

comment.name: comment
comment.description: Specifies additional information about the update.

documentName.name: name
documentName.description: Specifies the name of the document.

author.name: author
author.description: Specifies the iManage Work ID of the user who created the document.

operator.name: operator
operator.description: Specifies the ID of the user that has the document checked out or is currently editing the document's profile. For example, 'JSMITH'.

class.name: class
class.description: Specifies the class for identifying and differentiating the document. Document class is categorized by genre, department, region, and so on.

subclass.name: subclass
subclass.description: Specifies the subclass for identifying and differentiating the document. Document subclass is categorized by genre, department, region, and so on.

defaultSecurity.name: default_security
defaultSecurity.description: Specifies the default security access level. Possible values are 'inherit','private','view','public'.

isHIPAA.name: is_hipaa
isHIPAA.description: Specifies if the document is to be encrypted.

retainDays.name: retain_days
retainDays.description: Specifies the number of days a document must be inactive before marking it for archiving.

fileContents.name: file
fileContents.description: Specifies the contents of the file.

custom2.name: custom2
custom2.description: Specifies the value for custom2. To specify a value for custom2, you must also specify a value for custom1 in the same request, which is due to their parent-child relationship.

custom21.name: custom21
custom21.description: Specifies the value for custom21 in ISO 8601 datetime format.

custom22.name: custom22
custom22.description: Specifies the value for custom22 in ISO 8601 datetime format.

custom23.name: custom23
custom23.description: Specifies the value for custom23 in ISO 8601 datetime format.

custom24.name: custom24
custom24.description: Specifies the value for custom24 in ISO 8601 datetime format.

custom30.name: custom30
custom30.description: Specifies the value for custom30. To specify a value for custom30, you must also specify a value for custom29 in the same request, which is due to their parent-child relationship.

topMatchingId.title: Top Matching Folder ID
topMatchingId.description: Indicates the ID of the top matching folder. For example, 'ACTIVE_US!12'.

topMatchingName.title: Top Matching Folder Name
topMatchingName.description: Indicates the name of the top matching folder.

topMatchingId.title: Top Matching Template ID
topMatchingId.description: Indicates the ID of the top matching template. For example, 'ACTIVE_US!12'.

topMatchingName.title: Top Matching Template Name
topMatchingName.description: Indicates the name of the top matching template.

topMatchingId.title: Top Matching Workspace ID
topMatchingId.description: Indicates the ID of the top matching workspace. For example, 'ACTIVE_US!12'.

topMatchingName.title: Top Matching Workspace Name
topMatchingName.description: Indicates the name of the top matching workspace.
